title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Halloween Goat Masks
content:
Play GTA Online anytime through October 9 to receive the Black Demon Goat Mask, and take part in any 2 Arena War modes to complete the Weekly Challenge and receive the Red Demon Goat Mask along with GTA$100,000.

The Arena War Series is also offering 3X GTA$, RP, and Arena Points this week â€” to enlist in this realm of automotive gladiatorial combat, head down to the Maze Bank Arena or enter via the Quick Join option on your iFruit.
